hadith.chapter: The Book Pertaining to Repentance and Exhortation to Repentance - كتاب التوبة
hadith.arabic-text: حدثنا عثمان بن أبي شيبة، حدثنا جرير، عن سليمان التيمي، بهذا الإسناد قالأصاب رجل من امرأة شيئا دون الفاحشة فأتى عمر بن الخطاب فعظم عليه ثم أتى أبابكر فعظم عليه ثم أتى النبي صلى الله عليه وسلم فذكر بمثل حديث يزيد والمعتمر ‏.‏
hadith.english-text: This hadith has been narrated on the authority of Sulaiman Taimi with the same chain of transmitters that a person had taken liberty with a woman less than fomication. He came to 'Umar b. Khattab and he took it to be a serious offence. Then he came to Abu Bakr and he also took it to be a serious offence. Then he came the Allahs Apostle (may peace be upon him) and he made a mention of this to him. The rest of the hadith is the same.
